nodes.text: The Contispex dynasty was a dynasty of Supreme Chancellors of the Galactic Republic during the Pius Dea Era. Members of the Pius Dea religious group, many of the Contispex dynasty were in fact descended from its founder Contispex I, including Contispex I's son Contispex II. The last Chancellor of the dynasty, Contispex XIX, was captured by the Jedi Order aboard the Flame of Sinthara and taken to Caamas, where he was tried and imprisoned for the rest of his life.
